memo_text:
* Bidder 1, starting with $20000, has won 1 items in this auction, with a total profit of $800.:
  * Won Thingamajig C at $1200 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.

* Bidder 2, starting with $20000, has won 3 items in this auction, with a total profit of $8500.:
  * Won Contraption I at $3500 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Element R at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Implement G at $4000 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.

* Bidder 3, starting with $20000, has won 3 items in this auction, with a total profit of $8300.:
  * Won Unit Q at $6500 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Machine P at $6500 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Gizmo F at $2700 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.

* Bidder 4, starting with $20000, has won 5 items in this auction, with a total profit of $8000.:
  * Won Gadget B at $1300 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Appliance O at $6000 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Utensil N at $5500 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Apparatus H at $4500 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Equipment E at $2700 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
